name: onecolor
description: Javascript color object with implicit color space conversions. Supports RGB, HSV, HSL and CMYK with alpha channel.

scripts.build: browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ minifyify --map one-color-all.map --output one-color-all.map ] --debug -e index -s one.color > one-color-all.js && browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ minifyify --map one-color.map --output one-color.map ] --debug -e minimal -s one.color > one-color.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && bash -c 'git add one-color{-all,}.{js,map}'
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run coverage
